title: Mars Transit in the 8th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Mars transiting your eighth house intensifies inner transformation, shared resources, and hidden power dynamics. The drive to confront fears, secrets, or unresolved matters grows strong, often pushing deep psychological change. Sudden reactions around control, trust, or intimacy may surface. Energy turns inward and can feel volatile if suppressed. When guided consciously, this transit supports fearless self-exploration, decisive handling of joint finances, and powerful regeneration through disciplined emotional awareness.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Strong urge to confront hidden issues.

sections.heading: Career
points: Research, investigation, or crisis roles activate.
Power struggles at work require tact.

closing: Mars in the 8th house demands courage to face the unseen. When energy is directed inward with discipline, deep transformation becomes a source of strength.
